name: Brad Neely's Harg Nallin' Sclopio Peepio
original_name: Brad Neely's Harg Nallin' Sclopio Peepio
overview: Brad Neely's Harg Nallin' Sclopio Peepio is an American animated television series created by Brad Neely. Formatted as a sketch comedy show, it is made up of short films and routines, with songs composed by Neely.
